name: Create a new record in Airtable from a new response in VideoAsk
description:
Every time a new response is submitted in VideoAsk, a new record will be instantly created in Airtable.

The record will contain text responses as well as media responses. 

Even though the template configuration looks complicated, you don't have be afraid. It's quite simple to set up and only a few inputs are required from you.

The template expects your VideoAsk to collect contact details (email + name).

The template also expects your Airtable table to have at least these columns:
1) Email as email
2) Name as short text
3) Datetime as date with time
4) Text Answers as long text
5) Media Files as attachment

If you don't have the needed columns in your target Airtable table, the template will not work properly.
